original_title: Gervonta Davis vs. Hector Luis Garcia
overview: Five-time world champion and boxing superstar Gervonta “Tank” Davis returns to his native DMV area to face undefeated world champion Héctor Luis García in a high-stakes showdown on Saturday, January 7, at Capital One Arena in Washington, D.C.  Gervonta Davis vs. Hector Luis Garcia  Jaron Ennis vs. Karen Chukhadzhian  Rashidi Ellis vs. Roiman Villa  Demetrius Andrade vs. Demond Nicholson
title: Gervonta Davis vs. Hector Luis Garcia
